00036 #include "SingleTraceOutputModifier.hpp"
00037 #include "HeartConfig.hpp"
00038 #include "MathsCustomFunctions.hpp"
00039 
00040 void
00041 SingleTraceOutputModifier::InitialiseAtStart(DistributedVectorFactory* pVectorFactory)
00042 {
00043     // Collectively open the output directory - this might already be in place from creating the HDF5 file
00044     OutputFileHandler output_handler(HeartConfig::Instance()->GetOutputDirectory(), false);
00045 
00046     // Only the node owner needs to proceed here
00047     if (pVectorFactory->IsGlobalIndexLocal(mGlobalIndex))
00048     {
00049         // Set the local index correctly
00050         mLocalIndex = mGlobalIndex - pVectorFactory->GetLow();
00051         // Open the file as new
00052         mFileStream = output_handler.OpenOutputFile(mFilename);
00053     }
00054 }
00055 
00056 void
00057 SingleTraceOutputModifier::FinaliseAtEnd()
00058 {
00059     if (mLocalIndex != UINT_MAX)
00060     {
00061         mFileStream->close();
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 void
00067 SingleTraceOutputModifier::ProcessSolutionAtTimeStep(double time, Vec solution, unsigned problemDim)
00068 {
00069     if (mLocalIndex != UINT_MAX)
00070     {
00071         double* p_solution;
00072         VecGetArray(solution, &p_solution);  //This does not need to be collective
00073         (*mFileStream) << time;
00074         for (unsigned i=0; i<problemDim; ++i)
00075         {
00076             (*mFileStream) << "\t" << p_solution[mLocalIndex*problemDim+i];
00077         }
00078         (*mFileStream) << "\n";
00079         VecRestoreArray(solution, &p_solution);
00080 
00081         if (mFlushTime > 0.0 && Divides(mFlushTime, time))
00082         {
00083             mFileStream->flush();
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 #include "SerializationExportWrapperForCpp.hpp"
00089 CHASTE_CLASS_EXPORT(SingleTraceOutputModifier)
